data.message: I have sent a message, but have received no response. I have a friend whose 2 pages were hacked! One of them just added am "S" at the end and is posted random stuff.  The one page had over 160,000 likes, that is probably why they hacked it.  The new page is called Gizmo's Frenss- this is not the real one!!! Please help my friend get her pages back!! There is no real way to contact you guys. Just keep going in circles!!

replies.message: Hi Michelle. If your friend's Page was hacked, please tell them to follow these instructions: http://bit.ly/2nV5IIe. -Jessica
Don't worry. I did the same thing and was ignored. Apparently Facebook is approaching bullying (or even actual danger!) The way the school administrators in 13 reasons why do.
Facebook yeah that does not help at all!   Goes around and around and goes no where!
